snippet: A French specialist in takeout sushi is opening a satellite in Midtown Manhattan.
abstract: A French specialist in takeout sushi is opening a satellite in Midtown Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: Some 14 years ago in Paris, a shop specializing in sushi opened for takeout and delivery in the posh 16th Arrondissement. It was not a restaurant. "Sushi was not so well known in France then, and we also wanted to add our creativity to what the Japanese were doing traditionally," said Gregory Marciano, the president of the company, which now has 90 shops and restaurants in Europe.

headline.main: Sushi Shop, From Paris to Madison Avenue
